dino426 Your definitions are wrong Bro. Netori is merely a story written from the prospective of the person who’s STEALING the wife/husband. Netorare is (usually) written from the prospective of the person being GETTING STOLEN from. Netorase is a (usually) a husband getting sexual excitement from his wife having sex with another man.

FMC is the only winner in this story, she has two cucks eating at the palm of her hand. Husband is an obvious cuck and MC is an oblivious cuck falling in love with a woman who neglected him for years and still keeps him as her side dish until the end.
